name: NXP Semiconductors Netherlands B.V.
goal: NXP Semiconductors creates solutions that enable secure connections for a smarter world. Building on its expertise in high-performance mixed-signal electronics, NXP is driving innovation in the areas of connected cars, cyber security, portables & wearables, and the Internet of Things.
interests: Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Industrial Policy; Cyber Security; Privacy; Smart Mobility ; EU Funding; Horizon 2020 (Framework Programme + ECSEL JU); Innovation Union; EU Trade policy; Innovation Policy, Digital Agenda, Information Society, Research and Technology, Certification & Standardisation
